titles.title: To provide for the conveyance of certain National Forest System lands to the towns of Laona and Wabeno, Wisconsin.
To provide for the conveyance of certain National Forest System lands to the towns of Laona and Wabeno, Wisconsin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain National Forest System lands to the towns of Laona and Wabeno, Wisconsin.
